text: Section C: Essay [30 marks] Spend 45 minutes on this section. Answer one question from questions 25-30. Write your answer on pages 41-44 of this booklet. EEI Area of study 2: Pop music (Named artists: Stevie Wonder; Joni Mitchell; Muse; Beyonc√©: Daft Punk; Labrinth) Do you agree that pop music must always be simple in order to make a big impact? To support your answer, you should refer in detail to songs by two of the named artists.
